grim_darkness.name: Grim Darkness (Work In Progress)
grim_darkness.description: Sci-fi battles in the far future with many unique and possibly familiar factions.

world_war_two.name: World War Two (Work In Progress)
world_war_two.description: World War Two battles with some added twists and a focus on adding interesting rules and choices.

ancients.name: Ancients (Concept Phase)
ancients.description: Ancients skirmish battles with some added twists and a focus on adding interesting rules and choices.

third_age.name: The Third Age (Work In Progress)
third_age.description: Skirmish battles in a Fantasy world.

impact.name: Impact
impact.description: This model causes X hits with no AP when it successfully charges an enemy unit.

phalanx.name: Phalanx
phalanx.description: You may make X free attacks with this weapon when a unit moves into your engagement range.

exposed.name: Exposed
exposed.description: This model may receive suppression even from weapons that it can't be damaged by.

assault.name: Assault
assault.description: Models with this weapon may make a free shoot action after moving at -1 Accuracy. They may not shoot again this round.

blast.name: Blast
blast.description: Multiply hits from this weapon by X.
blast.notes: Don't pay more than once for range with blast weapons.

ammo.name: Ammo
ammo.description: This weapon may only be fired X times per game.
ammo.pointNotes: Always apply this rule last or your numbers will be off.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: This model may ignore terrain and other models without the Fly special rule when moving.

deployable.name: Deployable
deployable.description: This model can be set up at any time during its containing units activation. If its containing unit moves out of coherency the model is destroyed.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: This unit may be set aside in reserves before the match begins if all models have ambush. At the beginning of any round after the first you may place the unit anywhere on the table over 9” away from enemy units. If both players have units with Ambush they must roll-off to see who deploys first, and then alternate in placing them.

scout.name: Scout
scout.description: When this model arrives on the field, it may make a free 6" move.

outflank.name: Outflank
outflank.description: This unit may be set aside in reserves before the match begins if all models have outflank. At the beginning of any round after the first you may place the unit within 5" of a table edge over 9” away from enemy units. If both players have units with Outflank they must roll-off to see who deploys first, and then alternate in placing them.

deadly.name: Deadly
deadly.description: Units with Damage Table(X) roll add X to their rolls for the Damage Table.

regeneration.name: Resilient
regeneration.description: Roll a die when this model loses a wound. On a value of X or less that wound is not lost.

reach.name: Reach
reach.description: This weapon may engage and fight models up to X" away. Enemy models must still move into base contact unless they also have reach.

lucky.name: Lucky
lucky.description: This model may re-roll X Resist tests per attack.

tough.name: Tough
tough.description: This model must fail X additional saves before it is killed. If a unit contains multiple models with Tough, damage must be assigned to an already damaged model before being assigned to any other model.

crew.name: Crew
crew.description: This model is crewed by X additional models (in addition to the one carrying the weapon), each of which must be killed before the weapon is disabled. When the amount of crew is reduced to half or less, this weapon suffers -1 to hit. This unit takes up X additional transport space.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: Models suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this unit at a range of more than 12".

poison.name: Poison
poison.description: Successful hit rolls of 1 or 2 with this weapon cause X hits instead of 1.

armored_front.name: Armored(Front)
armored_front.description: This unit gets +1 Save when hit in its front arc.

vulnerable_side_rear.name: Vulnerable(Side, Rear)
vulnerable_side_rear.description: This unit gets -1 Save when hit in its Side arc or -2 Save when hit in its Rear arc.

vulnerable_rear.name: Vulnerable(Rear)
vulnerable_rear.description: This unit gets -1 Save when hit in its Rear arc.

furious.name: Furious
furious.description: When this model charges, hit rolls of 1 or 2 generate an additional attack.

relentless.name: Relentless
relentless.description: When this model shoots, each successful hit roll of 1 or 2 generates an additional shot with that weapon.

magic.name: Magic
magic.description: This unit may cast X Powers at any point during its movement. To cast, roll a D10 and if the result is equal to or less than the power's cast value it is successful. A unit may only successfully cast each power once per turn. Any other Magic unit within 24" may attempt to dispel the Magic power. Roll a D10. If the value is lower than the rolled value for the test, the power is stopped. If the spell is not stopped, no further attempts may be made to stop the same power. If this model is locked in Melee, it may only target units in the combat. This ability may not be used against enemy units in melee with friendly units.

dispel.name: Ward
dispel.description: This unit within 24" may attempt to dispel Magic powers. Roll a D10. If the value is lower than the rolled value for the test, the power is stopped. If the spell is not stopped, no further attempts may be made to stop the same power.

hover.name: Hover
hover.description: This unit may ignore difficult terrain and low obstacles when moving.

agile.name: Agile
agile.description: This unit may ignore low obstacles when moving.

walker.name: Walker
walker.description: This unit may ignore low obstacles when moving.

repair.name: Repair
repair.description: Once per turn, if within 2” of a Vehicle, roll one die. On a 5 or less the vehicle may regain X wounds.

damage_table_vehicle.name: Damage Table(Vehicle)
damage_table_vehicle.description:
When this model fails a Save, roll a D10 adding the amount the Save was failed by and refer to the following: 
 * Damaged(2-3): The unit permenantly suffers -1 Accuracy and -1 Strength. 
 * Slowed(4-5): Permenantly halve its Movement characteristic. 
 * Fire(6-7): Take 2 additional strain and immediately take a break test. If failed the unit is destroyed. 
 * Destroyed(8-9): It instantly destroyed. 
 * Explosion(10+): The unit explodes and all units within 6" take 3 hits with AP2.

catches_fire.name: Catches Fire
catches_fire.description: This unit suffers the "Fire" result on the Vehicle Damage table on rolls of (5-7) instead of (6-7).

damage_table_monster.name: Damage Table(Monster)
damage_table_monster.description:
When this model fails a Save, roll a D10 adding the amount the Save was failed by and refer to the following: 
 * Damaged(2-3): The unit permenantly suffers -1 Accuracy and -1 Strength. 
 * Slowed(4-5): Permenantly halve its Movement characteristic. 
 * Panic(6-7): Take 2 additional strain and immediately take a break test. 
 * Destroyed(8+): It instantly destroyed.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.description: This unit requires an extra suppression to take break tests.

resist.name: Protect
resist.description: This unit gets +X to its Resist rolls.

open_topped.name: Open-Topped
open_topped.description: Units inside this transport may take a single fire action when activated. Up to X models total may fire their weapons.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: When this model activates, it may first teleport up to X inches in any direction ignoring models any terrain.

transport.name: Transport
transport.description: This model may carry X Infantry models or one Artillery model inside of it.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: This weapon may ignore the Long Range penalty. You may choose which model is hit and these hits may not be reassigned to other friendly units.

aircraft.name: Aircraft
aircraft.description: Enemy units suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this model. This model may ignore terrain and other models when moving. This model may only turn up to 90 degrees. When activated, it must first take a free move action its full movement distance in a straight line. If it ends its move off the table, place it back on any table edge. Its activation then ends.

strider.name: Strider
strider.description: This model can cross difficult and dangerous terrain without penalty.

rending.name: Rending
rending.description: Hit rolls of 1 or 2 have +2 AP.

indirect.name: Indirect
indirect.description: This weapon may target units out of line of sight at -1 Accuracy.

anti_air.name: Anti-air
anti_air.description: This weapon gets +1 to hit units with the Aircraft special rule.

titanic.name: Titanic
titanic.description: When this unit is activated it may only perform one action and benefit from abilties which trigger when the unit is activated once. It may then be activated a second time to perform its second action.

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: One model in this unit may use this weapon instead of any other weapons.

leader.name: Leader
leader.description: When this unit is activated, friendly Infantry units within 6" may choose to activate and perform the same actions as this unit. Friendly Infantry units within 6" may use this unit's Courage value when taking Courage tests. This unit may not be targetted by enemy attacks while it is within 3" of another friendly Infantry unit.

hero.name: Hero
hero.description: When this unit is activated, friendly Infantry units within 6" may choose to activate and perform the same actions as this unit.

cumbersome.name: Cumbersome
cumbersome.description: This model hits with this weapon at -1 Strength when fighting in engagement range.
